messages.content: The experienced and local choice for West Berkshire on June 8th

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To ensure West Berks continues to be the best place to start and grow a business
To protect our local NHS and raise awareness and improve care for those with mental illness
To ensure we have the best deal for West Berks as we leave the EU
To see continued investment in local transport – driving forward completion of electrification on the railway and improvements to safety on the A34
To continue to campaign for better mobile and broadband links for our rural communities
